betterAnimeMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
betterAnimeMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

betterAnimeMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
betterAnimeMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
betterAnimeMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

betterAnimeMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
betterAnimeMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

betterAnimeMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
betterAnimeMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !betterAnimeMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

betterAnimeMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
betterAnimeMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !betterAnimeMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
